r.s: Port of the RAP RDQL API
r.d: This package is a port of the RDQL part of the RDF API for PHP (aka RAP): http://www.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/suhl/bizer/rdfapi/.
r.n: - fixed several incorrect calls to RDF::raiseError() - propagate PEAR errors to the user - cosmetic fixes QA release Package 2.0 Bug #17786 Patch to avoid deprecated eregi_replace SVN dir structures
